attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Isn’t it apt that we are celebrating the 25th anniversary of the Falklands War.? One in which a woman prime minister took immediate and decisive action to take back what is ours.

At the same time we have a limp wristed government who are happy to see members of Her Majesty's forces taken illegally in what should have been as an act of war by Iran.

Stop procrastinating and take action NOW and bring our boys & girl home!

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
